lrc.lyric:
[by:布鲁百lee]
[00:00.75]One, two, three, four
[00:04.31]
[00:19.73]Bittersweet Strawberry, Marshmallow, Butterscotch
[00:27.77]Polar Bear, Cashew, Dixieland, Phosphate Chocolate
[00:35.86]Lime, Tutti-frutti, Special Raspberry, leave it to me
[00:43.62]Three Grace, Scotch Lassie, Cherry Smash, Lemon Freeze
[00:51.91]I wanna go to Marz
[00:55.12]Where Green Rivers flow
[00:59.18]And your sweet sixteen is waiting for you after the show
[01:07.92]I wanna go to Marz
[01:10.97]You'll meet the Gold Dust Twins tonight
[01:14.77]You'll get your heart's desire
[01:17.12]I will meet you under the lights
[01:23.49]
[01:39.46]Golden Champagne, Juicy Grapefruit, Lucky Monday
[01:47.38]High School Football, Hot Fudge, Buffalo, Tulip Sundae
[01:55.41]Almond Caramel Frappe, A Pineapple, Root Beer
[02:03.19]Black and White, Big Apple, Henry Ford, Sweetheart, Maple Tear
[02:11.53]I wanna go to Marz
[02:14.80]Where Green Rivers flow
[02:18.71]And your sweet sixteen is waiting for you after the show
[02:27.57]I wanna go to Marz
[02:31.03]You'll meet the Gold Dust Twins tonight
[02:35.00]You'll get your heart's desire
[02:37.40]I will meet you under the lights
[02:43.76]

tlyric.lyric:
[by:-黄-大大]
[00:00.75]一，二，三，四
[00:19.73]苦涩草莓，棉花糖，奶油糖
[00:27.77]北极熊，腰果，迪克西兰(爵士乐)，磷酸巧克力
[00:35.86]青柠，什锦水果，最好的覆盆子，留给我
[00:43.62]三位女神，苏格兰少女，樱桃碎，冰镇柠檬
[00:51.91]我想去马尔斯
[00:55.12]绿河流经的地方
[00:59.18]你的16岁少女在等你演出结束
[01:07.92]我想去马尔斯
[01:10.97]今晚你会遇到金尘双胞胎
[01:14.77]你的心会感到渴望
[01:17.12]我会在灯光下等你
[01:39.46]金香槟，多汁葡萄柚，幸运星期一
[01:47.38]高中足球，热软糖，水牛，郁金香圣代
[01:55.41]杏仁焦糖，菠萝，根汁汽水
[02:03.19]黑和白，大苹果，亨利·福特，甜心，枫的眼泪
[02:11.53]我想去马尔斯
[02:14.80]绿河流经的地方
[02:18.71]你的16岁少女在等你演出结束
[02:27.57]我想去马尔斯
[02:31.03]今晚你会遇到金尘双胞胎
[02:35.00]你的心会感到渴望
[02:37.40]我会在灯光下等你
